# Problem 1
## Create Data Frame

```{r problem1_a}

library(tidyverse)

hw1_df = tibble(
  norm_samp = rnorm(10, mean =1),
  norm_samp_pos = norm_samp > 0,
  vec_char = c("Portland", "Seattle", "New York City", "Los Angeles", "Denver", "Chicago", "Boston", "Baltimore", "Atlanta", "Philadelphia"),
  vec_factor = factor(c("small", "medium", "large", "large", "medium", "medium", "small", "large", "medium", "small"))
)
hw1_df

mean_samp = mean(pull(hw1_df, norm_samp))
mean_samp = mean(pull(hw1_df, norm_samp_pos))
mean_samp = mean(pull(hw1_df, vec_char))
mean_samp = mean(pull(hw1_df, vec_factor))
 
```

Cannot take the mean of vec_char or vec_factor because arguments are not numeric or logical. 
We can convert these variable types.
